title: Taint with TolerationSeconds
description: Create a Pod named ||temp-pod|| in namespace ||pluto|| with image ||alpine:3.16|| that tolerates taint ||maintenance=true:NoExecute|| for ||300|| seconds.

steps: kubectl run temp-pod --image=alpine:3.16 -n pluto --dry-run=client -o yaml -- sleep 3600 > pod.yaml

validations.description: Pod should tolerate maintenance taint for 300 seconds
